c1.name: Additional Investment
c1.effect: The number of After-Sales Service Rounds created by **Troubleshooter Shots** is increased by 1.

c2.name: Special Franchise
c2.effect: When you are in combat and the **Jinni** heals the character it is connected to, it will fire a Jinni Toop from that character's position that deals 50% of Dori's ATK DMG.

c3.name: Wonders Never Cease
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Alcazarzaray's Exactitude** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Discretionary Supplement
c4.effect:
The character connected to the **Jinni** will obtain the following buffs based on their current HP and Energy:
路When their HP is lower than 50%, they gain 50% Incoming Healing Bonus.
路When their Energy is less than 50%, they gain 30% Energy Recharge.

c5.name: Value for Mora
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Sprinkling Weight
c6.effect:
Dori gains the following effects for 3s after using **Spirit-Warding Lamp: Troubleshooter Cannon**:
路Electro Infusion.
路When Normal Attacks hit opponents, all nearby party members will heal HP equivalent to 4% of Dori's Max HP. This type of healing can occur once every 0.1s.
